Howard Paul Hartley (September 26, 1924 â€“ September 29, 2006) was an American professional football running back and defensive back in the National Football League for the Washington Redskins and the Pittsburgh Steelers.
He played college football at Duke University, on the 1943, 1946, and 1947 teams. He played in the NFL from 1948 through 1952.
